But, when the local town leaders notify her that they will have to seize the property after the holidays, her last hope to unite the town, is to throw a Christmas concert on the farm, headlined by her former love, a ne'er-do-well country music superstar. As the day of the concert approaches, they all must learn the value of family, faith and community—before time runs out.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Take your little explorer on an exotic musical expedition to meet wild animals from across the globe. Journey to the jungle, savannah, desert and forest.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As little ones become increasingly mobile, their fascination with all things that move intensifies too. On the Go: Riding, Sailing and Soaring exposes babies to the different ways people travel -- on land, by sea, and in the air -- while it presents them with captivating real-world images, funny puppet shows, and beautiful classical music by Beethoven, Haydn, Mozart and Rossini.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Perhaps the sweetest sounds you'll ever hear are the babbles and coos that one day become ma-ma, da-da and I love you. Besides being music to your ears, these baby steps of language change everything as your little one discovers an exciting, powerful new way of relating to the world! Baby's First Sounds invites both of you to share these memorable moments: those precious ''firsts'' that come around once in your baby's lifetime.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Baby Lullaby takes your baby on a soothing journey with classical lullabies by Bach, Brahms and Mozart. Enjoy relaxing ocean waves, sweet puppet shows and tranquil images. From fun time to rest time, Baby Lullaby is the perfect way to spend special time with your baby.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As little ones' curiosity about the world blossoms, you can help sow the seeds of discovery with Baby MacDonald: A Day on the Farm. Featuring live-action images, nursery rhymes and fun-filled puppet shows, this playful, interactive program introduces little ones to the exciting sights and sounds of a real working farm.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: From the day their eyes open, babies begin to observe new things around the world and about themselves. Baby Da Vinci From Head to Toe presents them with a playful and interactive introduction to the human body in three languages -- English, Spanish, and French. With a whimsical blend of adorable puppets, real children and animals and famous works of art, this captivating program also features upbeat classical music.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Within the first year of babies' lives, their physical development begins to kick into high gear as they explore ways to physically interact with the world around them. BABY'S FIRST MOVES is a joyful celebration of their movement milestones -- including first steps, clapping, jumping, dancing and more.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Within a baby's first year of life, new experiences can transform what might otherwise seem to be ordinary events into exciting opportunities for imaginative play. Baby Neptune exposes little ones to the wonders of water in their world -- whether they're stomping in the rain, splashing in the bathtub, playing "catch me if you can" with the tide on the beach, or "meeting" the fascinating creatures that live in rivers, lakes and oceans.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: World Music introduces you and your little one to beautiful sounds from every continent, bringing a fresh, new experience of music and culture. Sing, dance and play to exotic rhythms that open the door to an appreciation of different cultures from around the world.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Your little one will want to keep a beat, snap his fingers and march his feet! Join new characters Pillie, the musical woodpecker, and Coco, the dancing cockatoo, and share the excitement of rhythm with your baby. World of Rhythm explores rhythm in music, rhythm in nature and rhythm as a form of expression.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Sharing the joys and traditions of the holiday season with your little one is truly one of the greatest gifts of parenthood, and Baby Santa's Music Box makes this magical time even more special! Celebrate by treating your baby and yourself to a captivating wonderland of bright lights, sparkling ornaments, sleigh bells, toys, winter scenes, jolly Santas and more -- all accompanied by beloved holiday melodies.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Early on in babies' development, they begin to recognize primary colors such as blue, red, and yellow. And all the while, they're also processing an infinite variety of new sights and sounds. Think of the joy you'll experience as you introduce your little one to beautiful music and imagery with Baby Beethoven Symphony of Fun.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: One of the greatest joys you'll ever experience is bonding with your baby during those calm, quiet moments. Lullaby Time: Soothing Sounds for Baby provides comforting sights and sounds as you relax and share this precious downtime.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney tells Ryan a story about how a boy became emperor by being honest. After BJ takes credit for Sarah's painting, Barney teaches him to always be honest with his friends.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop tries to convince to BJ and Riff that she had seen an elephant in the park. Barney introduces Riff of the best deaf musicians of all time - Beethoven.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It is Wendy's birthday, but she doesn't want any fuss. / The town is practicing for an egg and spoon race.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Blueberry ordered some Zippy Gro daisy seeds and planted them in her garden. She is surprised that they've sprouted in less than a day despite their descriptive moniker. Strawberry comes by to admire them and Blueberry is reminded that the new cookbook Strawberry ordered has arrived. Strawberry is excited to try out the new corn muffin recipe, as its level of difficulty will be a challenge for her. Strawberry follows the muffin recipe, mixes the ingredients, and double checks it.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry is at Orange's store to mail a birthday card to a friend in Big Bitty City. Just after she drops the card into the mail slot, an ill postal carrier bee sneezes sending envelopes and post cards flying in all directions. The two girls help Jadeybug, a postal clerk, and Postmaster Bee gather up the strewn letters and the ill bee gets sent home from work.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: While rehearsing a song alone in her cafe, Strawberry is interrupted by the arrival of Jadeybug. The poor ladybug is stressed out because her twin cousins, Kadiebug and Sadiebug, left her a message that they are coming to visit for a whole week. Jadey is unable to host them because she's having her guest room repainted.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: While at Orange's general store to pick up a package, Berrykin Bloom chats with Orange about the pogostick he gave her to help her reach the upper shelves. She is very appreciative. He ends up getting a package of special berry seeds he ordered, not the vacation magazine Orange thought he came for. He explains how the seeds were a better purchase because of all the benefits to the Berryworks but now he can no longer afford a vacation.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Plum decides to hold a dance recital at Strawberry's Café Cabaret stage and sends out a stack of invitations. She forgets, however, to check the sign-up sheet at the Café and schedules it for the same night as Blueberry is scheduled to read to the baby Berrykins. Strawberry tells Plum she cannot hold the recital in the Café on her chosen day because the Café is booked.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: All of Berry Bitty City is gathered around to watch the last snowberrykin melt. As the last bit of snow forms a puddle, a cheer goes up, spring is here! It's now time for the annual BerryFest. But with Princess Berrykin out of town on business, who will be the BerryFest Princess and preside over the festival?! Everyone is abuzz with how to go about choosing the Princess and what her duties will be. Postmaster Bee declares the only fair way to go about it is to hold an election. Everyone agrees.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry opens her front door to a throng of Berrykins all cheering for the new BerryFest Princess. She is appreciative of their admiration but unsure of exactly what her duties entail. In response the Berrykins bombard her with her duties - major to miniscule. One Berrykin sums it up by telling her she's responsible for presiding over all the activities of the BerryFest to make it the best.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: All of Berry Bitty City is excitedly making their way through the berry batch in search of the elusive Wanderberry. It is to be the dessert at the BerryFest Feast. Everyone is milling about searching for it on their own when Blueberry points out that the rules say the BerryFest Princess is in charge of the search. The girls turn to her for direction and she points them where she thinks the berry might be.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Overhearing Blueberry reading a story to the baby Berrykins about the scary Galumphalot, Orange is uncharacteristically shaken. She determines she doesn't want anything scary around her, just relaxation. But while the girls are having a hair-styling party at Lemon's salon, a malfunction at the BerryWorks causes the whole town to go dark. And Orange begins to get really anxious.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Blueberry has become obsessed with the mystery book detective heroine, Patti Persimmon. She decorates her store with Patti posters and rearranges her shelves to make room for all the Patti books she's ordered. Blueberry begins to neglect outings with her friends and even goes so far as to dress like her idol just to emulate her. She then starts looking for cases to solve around town.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: While in the midst of a cake decorating demonstration at the café, the girls are uncharacteristically interrupted by an excited Princess Berrykin. She announces the Berrykins have decided to revive the old tradition of the Berry Bitty Buggy Derby. While the girls enthusiastically recount the stories they've heard about it and ask the Princess questions, Blueberry, carrying enough books to block her view, comes through the door and unknowingly interrupts the Princess.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: The grove around Berry Bitty City is abuzz with activity. The Berrykins are using their sparkles to harvest berries, Berrykin Bloom is in his garden spraying flowers with a special solution to make them larger, and Raspberry is nearby gathering flower petals to make perfume. The wind starts to blow and picks up some of the sparkles. The sparkles float along the wind and get combined with some of Berrykin Bloom's solution.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: It's time again for the Dance-Off between the Big Bitty City Dance Team and the Berry Bitty City Dancers. Plum is stressed out and frazzled because she desperately wants to win. And the Big Bitty City Dancers are a force to be reckoned with. They are elegant and beautifully synchronized. Plum shows the girls a maze of dance steps that she's choreographed in the hopes of creating a winning piece. The problem is, the contest is only 1 week away!

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Raspberry is distraught when she suspects her friends have copied her design on her lantern for the "Glimmerberry Gathering".

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: While sipping cider in Strawberry's café, the girls muse about how they cannot wait for winter to arrive. They list the various traditions they love about the season but the one they all agree on is the Glimmerberry Ball. Strawberry mentions that she doesn't think the café can hold the party this year because of how the town has grown. The girls decide to split up and search for a new location.

programme.desc: Join the cute and cheeky Buster, as he rides into adventures both big and small with his friends!

programme.title: Toys and Colors
programme.desc: Toys and Colors teaches kids life skills, letters, numbers, and more – all in a fun and family-friendly way!

programme.title: Ryan's World
programme.desc: Ryan and the gang explore the world and discover wacky fun with familiar faces and brand new places!

programme.title: Jason Vlogs
programme.desc: Jason and Alex hit the road! The brothers visit a kids museum, the zoo, get their eyesight checked and more.

programme.title: The Golden Castle
programme.desc: When Lance is cast as the star in the new remake of the classic movie “Ned Knightly and the Golden Castle” he doesn't anticipate Jestro and his monsters invading the set and ruining his starring role. It's movie time! Lance does something very Lance: he agrees to star in a movie about remake of a classic film in Knighton: “The Golden Castle.” While pillaging a village, Jestro and the Book of Monsters see a movie poster for “The Golden Castle” and the book says the legendary Golden Castle is filled with riches! Jestro explains that it's just a dumb movie and that it's not real. It's all based on a “script.” The Book, who's been shelved for many years, wants to eat the movie script to learn more about the modern world. On the set of the movie, Lance has invited the other Knights to act as extras. When they see how Lance is being portrayed, they're incensed. When Jestro attacks the movie set to get the script for his book to eat, the film director keeps rolling. This battle footage is fantastic! The Knights defeat Jestro even though the movie set is trashed. The director will make it work. At the premier of the movie, Lance is embarrassed to see that he's been reduced to comic relief for the realm's bravest Knight…Macy! The director has now made her a star.

programme.title: Friends of The Jungle
programme.desc: When Olivia's Aunt Sophie is getting married and the groom has gone missing in the jungle, the girls fly out to the jungle in secret to try to find him in time for the wedding. The girls are super excited to be planning a wedding for Olivia's Aunt Sophie. There's just one little problem: Olivia learns that the groom has gone missing in the jungle while working at an animal rescue station! Not wanting to worry her aunt, Olivia, Stephanie and Mia secretly fly to the jungle to try and find the groom, Henry, rescuing a few animals along the way. Too bad Emma and Andrea couldn't keep the secret back in Heartlake City. Now, Sophie, Emma and Andrea join the others in the jungle to try and find Henry before the rapidly approaching wedding date!

programme.title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: The Maze Of Amazement
programme.desc: The Knights find themselves trapped in a maze looking for the Book of Deception. But will they actually get their hands on it, or will it keep deceiving them? The Knights travel to the Hill Country in the northern part of Knighton to Axl's home town of DIGGINGTON (where they realize that all of Axl's family look just like him.) While they're there, Merlok 2.0 detects something…one of the Magic Books! It's “The Book of Deception.” They go to find it and discover it ended up under a mountain. And, to make matters worse, the magic book has built a maze around itself to keep it from being found (it is deceptive!) As the NEXO-Knights enter the maze from one side, Jestro enters from the other the Book of Monsters has led him to the maze to get The Book of Deception, too. It's a race through this confusing maze to see who can get the book first. Ava figures out the maze is the Whackman maze from a videogame. After help from Axl's people to defeat Jestro and win the book, the knights discover it's a FAKE BOOK of deception. The Book of Deception created a fake copy of itself!

programme.title: Andrea's Big Moment
programme.desc: When famous pop star Livi comes to Heartlake City to judge a talent show, our five friends Olivia, Mia, Andrea, Emma and Stephanie all decide to enter – and one of them, in particular, really wants to win but faces some serious challenge from an old rival. A talent show has come to Heartlake City and all the girls enter the talent competition hoping to impress the judges, especially their idol, pop star Chloe. No one wants a shot at stardom more than Andrea, which is why the other girls are surprised when she doesn't show up to practice before the first round of the competition. Very nearly eliminated prior to the big show, Andrea panics and throws herself into an intense practice-training mode, even shutting her friends out when they're trying to help her with her performance. Just moments before her live TV debut, Andrea realizes she's missing a key element to her act. Can she pull it off without her friends? And are the other girls willing to help after being pushed away?

programme.title: The Royal Blacksmiths
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win “The Blade Cup” where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: The Black Knight
programme.desc: It seems the NEXO-Knights are attacking villages throughout the realm! But why? A mysterious Black Knight appears to defend the cities from the rogue NEXO-villains! Jestro, happy he has the REAL Book of Deception, uses it to create bad versions of the NEXO-Knights. The “fake” knights then attack villages and hamlets. When the real NEXO-Knights arrive, they're booed and pelted with food. Why does everyone hate them? To make matters more confusing, a giant Mech Suit in black – The BLACK KNIGHT – appears to defend the kingdom's villages from the fake knights. The Black Knight ends up being very powerful and throws Jestro and his fake knights for a loop. He's cool and mysterious. But when the fake Knights get the better of him, the REAL NEXO-Knights appear to fend them off and learn their deceptive secret. The Knights save the Black Knight and they open him up to find…young ROBIN! (He used a deep, deceptive voice.) The Knights realize that Robin has potential. But maybe he still has some learning to do.

programme.title: Kate's Island
programme.desc: The five friends leave for science camp that takes place on an island and during the trip, they meet the stand-offish Kate – but they soon realize that there's more to her than meets the eyes and that you shouldn't judge the book by its cover. No one is more excited than Olivia about science camp at a beautiful rocky offshore island with a lighthouse. But Olivia quickly gets off on the wrong foot with a mysterious girl named Kate who seems obsessed with a medallion necklace and the island's rumored history of pirates and treasure. Even worse for Olivia, Kate seems to be growing extra chummy with Mia, even sneaking around the island with her late at night. With the help of Stephanie, Emma and Andrea, Olivia is determined to get to the bottom of the girls' secret friendship and find out once and for all what they're searching for on the island, but they better not let Mrs. Stevens catch them out of their cabin past curfew.

programme.title: The Green Ninja
programme.desc: The ninjas are suspicious when their arch enemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son Lloyd - but realize they have to work together in their attempt to rescue Lloyd from the snakes inside the unstable Fire Temple that is built on a volcano.

programme.title: The Book Of Total Badness
programme.desc: The NEXO-Knights must fight Jestro's Monsters of Destruction which are attacking all over the Kingdom. But Merlok smells a trap…is he right? In a dark, destroyed part of the kingdom, Jestro arrives at the ruins of a HUGE castle. The Book of Monsters knows this place: the great evil wizard Monstrux lived here. The Book sniffs out some powerful magic in the ruins: “The Book of Destruction.” With this, The Book tells Jestro they can destroy the NEXO-Knights and then attack the King's Castle and cause massive destruction. Jestro creates destructive monsters and sends them all over the realm, so the Knights must separate and fight single combats all over the place. The Knights lose these battles (lesson: they have to work as a team!) And, just when the Knights are scattered across the Kingdom, Jestro attacks the King's Castle! It looks like all is lost. When Aaron, who has escaped, returns to see Jestro's attack, he realizes he must gather his fellow Knights. Merlok says it's very dangerous, but Aaron says he must take the risk to gather the Knights and save Knighton.

programme.title: The Grand Hotel
programme.desc: The five friends help out at The Grand Hotel that Andrea's family just bought during what was supposed to be a quiet weekend until a hotel critic arrives unexpectedly. The girls are ready to do everything to make a great impression – but things don't quite go according to plan. Andrea, Stephanie, Olivia, Emma and Mia have come for breakfast at the fanciest hotel in town, now owned by Andrea's family. When Andrea's aunt has to leave town, the girls volunteer to run the hotel for the weekend with the help of quirky Grandma Jean. This is the perfect job for Stephanie's expert managerial skills but then the hotel suddenly fills to capacity with guests, including a hotel critic that can make or break the hotel's reputation! Now the girls find themselves in over their heads juggling reception, childcare, food prep and waitressing, a dog-walking service and a testy chef who quits on them in the middle of dinner. Unfortunately, much of this is their own fault. Can the girls save the Grand Hotel from themselves?

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon – but can they trust him?

programme.title: The Might And The Magic
programme.desc: Aaron races across the kingdom to gather the NEXO-Knights as Jestro and his Destructive Monsters attack the King's Castle. The Knights must get back to the capitol in time, or Jestro will rule the kingdom! Jestro, while still attacking the King's Castle, has second thoughts until the Book of Monsters orders the mad jester to feed him another magic book he's found (and has been saving.) It's the powerful “Book of Revenge!” Now, combining the powers of Revenge and Destruction, Jestro and his monsters will get their vengeance on King Halbert and the Kingdom of Knighton. Jestro and his monsters lay siege…will they destroy the castle?! Meanwhile, Aaron races across the Kingdom gathering the NEXO-Knights one at a time. As each Knight rejoins the group, they become a more and more powerful team. They even get Robin to join them as the Black Knight in his repaired power suit. Our Knights arrive, finally regrouped, fight off Jestro, save the castle and the King. It's a glorious victory! The King is so pleased after seeing how the brave NEXO-Knights saved his kingdom, he allows Macy to join them as an official NEXO-Knight.

programme.title: The Rise Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: The ninja haste to the lost city of Ouroboros to try to stop Pythor from awaking The Great Devourer but it is a race against time.

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: When the NEXO-Knights are sloppy in a fight with Jestro, Merlok 2.0 sends them back to the Knights' Academy. Not only for a brush-up but to find out what Jestro is after in its hallowed halls. As they Knights battle Jestro – in a somewhat haphazard and lazy way – they discuss the fact that Jestro never wins and that they're always getting over on him. Despite defeating the jerky Jester and his evil Book, Merlok 2.0 discovers that something about the attack on the village is tied to the Knights' Academy. It looks like that's where they'll strike next. It wouldn't hurt for the Knights to go “back to school” to watch for Jestro and for some refresher training. Merlok is sure Jestro wants something at the Academy, but he doesn't know what it is. The Knights are very much “fish out of water” at the academy, even with the “cool kids” – Robin and Ava – showing them around. The next generation of Knights is being taught to integrate the NEXO-Magic of Merlok into their fighting techniques and these kids are good (so good, they initially kick the lazy, know-it-all Knight's butts!) Their old principal, the ever-ornery Headmaster Brickland, sets them straight: they're all still slackers, and they better get their acts together (especially Lance!) The Knights take shifts as “library helpers” much to the delight of the old squirebot librarian, MARGE. They're convinced Jestro is after a book…isn't he always after a book? When Jestro attacks, the Knights help organize the students and there's a big fight in the Academy Library versus Jestro and his Monsters. They drive Jestro off without letting him steal any books! Victory! But as Jestro leaves, we see him holding what the Book of Monsters really wanted: a snow globe with a castle in it that was sitting on the librarian's desk. In the Lava Lands, Jestro throws the snow globe into a volcano and it frees the massive Castle of Monstrux from its snowy magic prison

programme.title: Getting Tthe Message
programme.desc: As the Friends enjoy Heartlake Amusement Park, Emma types a text to Mia, but sends it to Matthew by mistake a text that could be mega-embarrassing for Emma! As her BFF's, the Friends race to find Matthew's phone and erase the text before he reads it. But first, they must brave space rides, dunking booths and worse: the boys locker room! What's more frightening than a roller coaster? Moretwisted than a funhouse mirror? A text gone wrong! TheFriends' fun day at Heartlake Amusement Park turns into afrantic race against time when Emma discovers that herinnocent text to Mia was sent to Matthew by mistake -- atext that accidentally sounds like a pledge of Emma'sundying love for Matthew! Mega-embarrassing! As Emma'sBFF's, the Friends must scramble to retrieve Matthew'sphone and erase the text before he reads it. But first,they need to brave space rides, dunking booths, an angrybrute and worse - the boys locker room!

programme.title: Day Of The Great Devourer
programme.desc: Disaster threatens as the ninja must fight to defeat the all consuming Great Devourer in a desperate attempt to save Ninjago.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik invents a giant AMNESIA RAY in his booby-trapped PINBALL FORTRESS (based on the Sonic game per Roger Hector) in order to erase the bad memories the Mobius citizens have of him, and make them think he's a great guy.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik announces that he will marry Queen Aleena in a plot to become the king of Mobius.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A captain of the Queen's guard is captured before he can reach the secret rendezvous where he was to meet Queen Aleena.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A homecoming is interrupted for Sonic, Sonia and Manic when Sleet and Dingo arrive to collect back taxes after returning to their birthplace.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sleet and Dingo plan to collect the taxes owed to Robotnik from the Duke of Velcronia but keep it for themselves.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The sinister Robotnik blackmails Cyrus, an old friend of Sonic's, by holding his father hostage.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: On a trip to Port Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia are told that ships are sinking due to the Mobian sea-beast.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Rumor has it that Queen Aleena's journals are buried in the city of Tashistan. Sonic and his siblings search the city for the scrolls.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: During a mission to one of Robotnik's factories, Sally is taken prisoner by Robotnik and Snively, who construct a roboti-sized "Sally" clone, complete with Sally's personality, and mannerisms. The double tricks Sonic into rescuing "Sally".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and the Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's lab in hopes of deciphering his roboti-sizer system. While underground, Sonic spots his now roboti-sized Uncle Chuck aboard a Badlands bound mine-train and devises a plan for his rescue.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sally, Rotor, Bunnie and Antoine take off in a homemade airplane, bound for an ancient city hidden deep in the Great Mountains, while Sonic follows via his favorite transportation, his sneakers.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic is hired into an obvious trap when a frustrated Robotnik decides to appeal to the Hedgehog's ego and announces a "race to determine the fastest on Mobius".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic conquers Robotnik's latest evil - a vehicle designated to locate and destroy living tissue matter - during a solo mission to the Badlands. Upon Sonic's return, the Freedom Fighters honor him with a victory party.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Robotnik launches a spy-orb that will uncover the Freedom Fighter's Knothole location, Sonic and Robot launch themselves up to the orbiting spy-sphere aboard a home-made rocket powered by Robotnik's discarded booster engine.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik announces that he will marry Queen Aleena in a plot to become the king of Mobius.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: When the Shane Gang travel to the Auroris Mine, they discover a legendary monster carved out of stone attacking the mines-the Pyritor. Trixie studies the legend to help them locate the creature's home and put a stop to its reign of terror, but first they must confront the true nature of the beast, and its assistant!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Determined to up his game against Stone Warriors, Kord visits a famous Eastern Technician for help creating a new blaster upgrade. Building the new upgrade is difficult...but working with the Technician is practically impossible!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: 15-year-old Eli Shane is a regular kid except for one thing: he comes from a long line of Shanes, each who has journied from the surface to protect Slugterra and the slugs that make the world special.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Now its Eli's turn to be Slugterra's next Shane - whether he's ready or not! Unfortunately, the slugslinging tournament he enters to prove that he's ready, pretty quickly shows that he's not! So when word of this new Shane reaches the ears of the nefarious Dr. Blakk, he's not too worried... yet.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: After the Shane hideout is ransacked, the gang trades in one of Eli's prized slugs for new gear. When Eli has second thoughts they go back to get it, only to learn that it's been sold to Dr. Blakk, along with hundreds of others to be transformed into feral Ghoul Slugs. Eli refuses to let his slug or any other get ghouled, so the team breaks in to Blakk's fortress to free them. While inside, they learn of Blakk's plan to conquer Slugterra.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: When the punks in the Hooligang cruise into Quiet Lawn Cavern, they think no one there's got the guts to stand up to them so they trash the place.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The gang signs up for a weekend camp that promises to teach your slugs tons of new moves - without lifting a finger! Eli thinks it sounds too good to be true... and it is. But exposing the truth draws the ire of the camp's director - and half the campers!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Slug Run is the ultimate, off-road, no-holds-barred, cross-cavern Mecha Beast race. Unfortunately, the only thing lower than the odds of beating the three-time champ who's now racing for Dr. Blakk are the odds of Eli making it to the finish line in one piece!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: When even Kord can't find a way to fix what's wrong with the new upgrades to the Shane Gang's Mecha Beasts, it's time to go to the source: the wondrous Mecha Forge! Hoping to find the cause of the glitch, the gang instead uncovers a huge conspiracy - hatched by Dr. Blakk!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Eli doesn't believe in ghosts - until he enters Deadweed cavern! But it turns out Eli's first instinct was right. What lurks inside Deadweed is far more evil than ghosts, its El Diablus Nacho, after a supply of the dangerous Dark Water that Dr. Blakk uses to turn innocent slugs into Ghouls.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: A short cut takes the Shane Gang through the territory of the Shadow Clan - and try as they might not to, they are discovered and captured by the mysterious creatures. Just when it looks like our heroes are done for, they are helped out of this jam by a most unlikely savior.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Pronto is thrown in jail on trumped-up charges by a corrupt judge, and the only chance to break him out is Eli making a one-in-a-million trick shot. Only one slinger in all of Slugterra can help Eli make a shot like that - Mario Bravado. Finding the formerly-great-but-now-washed-up Mario is easy. Getting him to help is something else entirely.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Long thought to be merely a legend, an Enigmo Slug has finally been spotted. The bidding is high for this rarest of all slugs, and so is the competition to be the first grab it! Eli and the gang actually beat Slugterra's most vicious slug hunter to the prize-only to find that the hunter is now hunting them!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: After a wild ride on the mysterious Flumes - the Underriver that runs beneath all of Slugterra - the Shane gang find themselves dropped into a sea cavern.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: A fun trip to the mall cavern turns un-deadly when the place is over run by the zombie-like victims of the Zombus slug. With Pronto zombified (not entirely a bad thing, the others kind of like this new, quieter, more monosyllabic Pronto), the rest of the Shane Gang must find the mysterious Mr. Saturday who controls the Zombus slugs-and find a way to stop him.

programme.title: Banana Day -Winx Club
programme.desc: As the Winx take a group of lemurs back to their natural habitat, a sudden attack by Kalshara and Brafilius transforms all the bananas into monsters, which attack monkeys and Specialists! The Winx decide to use their Stones of Memories to travel back in time and take a specimen of banana: only in this way, Flora will be able to grow new banana trees in the present for the lemurs habitat. But in the past, Stella is kidnapped by a giant lemur and things get more complicated: the Winx will have to rescue Stella and go back to the present with the giant lemur, which will neutralize all the banana-monsters and then become friend with its lemur cousins.

programme.title: Blippi and The Holiday Snow Globe
programme.desc: Join Blippi and Meekah as they learn all about festive seasons for different people around the world! Learn about Christmas and decorate a tree with Santa, Learn about Kwanzaa with Baba The Storyteller and Hanukkah at The Westside Jewish Community Center!

programme.title: Berry Double Trouble
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry hire twins Sweet & Sour to help out in Strawberry's café, so Strawberry will have time to appear in an internet fashion contest they are entering.

programme.title: Berry Bitty Adventurer
programme.desc: Strawberry's world-traveling cousin Apple Dumplin' stops at Berry Bitty City. What starts as a brief visit becomes a series of comical misadventures that ends with Apple finding a new home with Strawberry and her friends.

programme.title: Foods that are Super Powerful
programme.desc: Avery makes a power-packed dinner with Chef Robert Bartley who makes meals for Toronto's top sports teams. Lily stops at the Healthy Butcher for super-charged chicken and veggie sausages. Things heat up in the kitchen for the big chilli cook-off.

programme.title: Foods that are Wrapped
programme.desc: Can a meal be wrapped like a present? Lily finds out with Chef John Klianis when they prepare Spanakotiropita. Avery makes authentic Mexican tacos at La Tortilleria. Together with Matt, they wrap things up with meals in a package, or “En Papillotte” as the French say.

programme.title: A Surprise Visit, Stolen Treasure, A Flower For Olive
programme.desc: EP16: When Tijinou and Tijibelle lands on Lil'Pirate's beach, Lil'Pirate announces to them a huge surprise: the visit of Anoki the Inuit! EP17: Lil'Pirate takes big steps on the beach, including when Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive. And three steps towards the North! Then two steps towards the East! Then ten steps due South! Lil'Pirate arrives at the foot of the rock. One-thousand sardines! His treasure is there! He's sure of it! EP18: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive in the area surrounding the lighthouse, they notice Pauline the Octopus on the rocks, the 5 tentacles clinging to the ground, like stumps, and the body tense like a tent…

programme.title: Percival's Island, Bracelet for Olive, The Princess's Crown
programme.desc: EP19: When Tijinou and Tijibelle land on Lil'Pirate's beach, Lil'Pirate leads them to his favorite hideout: shhhh! He has a secret! He looks all around him, there's no one! He takes out a map! It's the map to go on a fabulous and magical island...EP20: For the birthday of Pauline the Octopus, Edmond wants to offer her a bracelet made of shells.EP21: The princess has broken a little part of her crown. Tijinou and Tijibelle will have to find the clown with the glue to repair it.

programme.title: Blippi Visits Rhythm Discovery Center
programme.desc: Make music with Blippi in this episode on percussion.

programme.title: High Tech Drama
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry's fashion podcast is saved by Apple, then almost sabotaged by Sweet and Sour when Lemon's "mood hair" runs amok, acting like the bickering twins, and the twins' comical argument is accidentally broadcast on the "berrynet."

programme.title: A Berry Merry Birthday
programme.desc: When Sour wishes she could have a birthday all her very own, her twin sister Sweet grants her wish by forgoing celebrating her birthday. But what begins as a day that Sour has always dreamed of quickly becomes a disappointment when she misses her twin. With Strawberry's help, Sour gives her birthday back to Sweet with a special surprise.

programme.title: The Magic Rainbow -Winx Club
programme.desc: As an important ball is taking place at Domino Castle, Kalshara and Brafilius are at Graynor Ruins to catch the Creature with the Rainbow Coat, in order to absorb its magic power. However, Kalshara's attempt fails, unleashing chaos between Wild Magic and Fairy magic, making the colours of Magix big rainbow blur into each other. Warned by Roxy, the Winx and their Fairy Animals enter the Rainbow MiniWorld: Musa and Critty manage to restore the balance of that magic place, thanks to their special magic sensitivity. In order to thank the Winx, the Creature with the Rainbow Coat reveals the Winx (being spied upon by Kalshara and Brafilius) that the Animal with the Ultimate Power is strictly linked to the fairies' power.

programme.title: Baby Winx -Winx Club
programme.desc: Kalshara e Brafilius think that the Animal with the Ultimate Power is one of the Fairy Animals bonded with the Winx. After setting a trap to the six fairies, Brafilius casts a time-reversal spell on their Stones of Memories, making the Winx turn back into little girls. As the Specialists, seeing them, mistake them for young tourists of the Animal Rescue Park, Kalshara easily catches their Fairy Animals… except for Bloom's unicorn. Despite the fact they are only little girls, the Winx manage to send away Brafilius with their magic, creating a funny circus show, and Elas attacks Kalshara, convincing her to leave. Bloom's unicorn, with his power, finally manages to make the Winx turn back to normal.

programme.title: Tall Tale Trio
programme.desc: When a comedy of errors causes Orange, Plum and Cherry to arrive late to their campout, they start off their annual tradition of telling tall-tales around the campfire by making up three outrageous, hysterical accounts of what held them up.

programme.title: Berry Big Tale-Teller
programme.desc: At the girls' campout, Sour launches into a whopper of a yarn about the adventures she and Sweet had in the "Berry Deep Dark Forest." She tries to get Sweet to participate in spinning the tale, but Sour's over-the-top performance leaves Sweet behind. Toward the end, Sour graciously changes the story to pull Sweet into it, giving Sweet the opportunity to toss in an ad lib that makes a nice topper to Sour's story. Sweet is thrilled when everyone applauds her, even Sour, who is impressed by her contribution and proud of her sister.

programme.title: Mr. Moon

programme.title: Kongsuni and Friends

Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it's not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Thunderbell, Ellie, and Kiki are looking hard for something. It turns out that when Thunderbell was trying on Kiki's crown, he accidentally dropped it and a gem went missing. Kiki sadly says that a princess' crown is worthless without a jewel. // Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that this year they won't be able to enjoy the traditional rainbow dumplings as the recipe was accidentally torn to pieces. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to become a chef.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: When Ruby and Choco arrive at the village, they find a very worried looking Ling Ling. Gina, Ellie, and Thunderbell went camping in Rainbow Forest but they saw a monster in the forest, got scared and had to run away. // Ruby is struggling to make a doll with her dad. Ruby and Choco get their suitcase and as Ruby swings her umbrella, there they are, in front of Rainbow fountain. Mayor Ling Ling tells her that today is the day of Princess Kiki's ballet performance.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ruby is looking at shoes that are now too small for her but she is unwilling to throw away. Ling Ling is worried about Thunderbell. His scooter broke so he is not able to carry out his work as a mail carrier. // Gina calls Rainbow Ruby because today is the day to show their appreciation to Mayor Ling Ling. It took a long time for the village friends to prepare an amazing painting for the mayor. Unfortunately, Thunderbell accidentally destroyed the painting while delivering it.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: There is a new menu at the restaurant, which is very popular. There is a long line in front of the restaurant but there weren't enough staff members to serve the villagers the food. Rainbow Ruby turns into a waitress using her magic suitcase and serve tables kindly. // Rainbow Village is full of marbles. The marbles that Rainbow Ruby spilled in her room poured down into the village from up above the sky! Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to transform into a paramedic.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Gina, Thunderbell, and Choco try to cheer Jessy up but their efforts are of no use. While talking to Mayor Ling Ling, Rainbow Ruby realizes that today is the day that Jessy first arrived in Rainbow Village! Jessy was upset that her friends forgot such a meaningful day to her. // Ling Ling has caught a bad cold and was sneezing all over the place. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase and transforms into a doctor and cares for him.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ling Ling is worried about the play planned for tonight. There are no costumes ready for the villagers so it's hard to figure out which roles they're playing. Rainbow Ruby transforms into a costume designer and designs costumes for her friends. // It is very windy in Rainbow village and Paige, a paper doll, is flying to wherever the wind takes her. She is so light that she is blown away by the wind. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to become a fire fighter and rescue Paige.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ling Ling is worried that the villagers are all in low spirits. Ruby thinks of fun games to play but the villagers say that they have already played all of the games too many times. Rainbow Ruby transforms into a singer. // Ling Ling is worried because of the "Secret Present Swapping Party" that Thunderbell is preparing. Thunderbell forgot to send out the invitations. Rainbow Ruby turns into a mail carrier and delivers the invitations.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that a Rainbow Ball Tournament is about to start soon but he is worried because the field is covered with pokey pods. Thunderbell, Ellie, and Gina are trying to pick them up and clear the field but it is not easy since the pokey pods are so spikey. // Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that he lost his glasses. Then Ellie tells her she lost her needles, Gina her hat, and Thunderbell his wheels. Who could have taken away all these things?

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ling Ling is waiting for Rainbow Ruby, looking worried. It turns out that Mr. Sloth's best friend Chirpee is depressed. Chirpee wants to fly high but is struggling due to his small wings and lack of means to learn how to fly. // Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that the dress that the paper doll Paige was planning to wear to Kiki's dance party is torn. Paige very much wants to go to the party but she cannot go without a dress.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: In Rainbow Village, people are busy preparing for a dance marathon, a competition in which all of the villagers participate. Ling Ling is very sad that Ellie decided not to participate. Ellie is not a confident dancer so she doesn't want to participate. // Rainbow Ruby's friends tell her that they are now friends with Felicia. They were playing hide and seek but Felicia is such a good hider that she's refused to come out even though she's won the game.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Kiki wants to become a movie actress but the villagers have no idea how to direct a movie. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to turn into a movie director. She then assigns roles to the village friends. // Ling Ling rushes toward Rainbow Ruby to tell her that a busy villager mom asked him to take care of her three children but he just doesn't have time to look after them. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to transform into a babysitter and starts babysitting the children.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Princess Kiki is asleep, UP IN THE AIR! According to the note that Kiki left behind, a princess falls under a spell from time to time and in order to break it, they need to play the music box nearby Kiki. But the music box is broken. // Rainbow Ruby and Choco discover cars moving in every direction. Ling Ling asks Rainbow Ruby for help and she uses her magic suitcase to become a police officer.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that today is Noodle Festival day in the village but there is a problem. The problem is that the noodle tree, which grows noodles, decided to take a year off and is not growing any noodles this year. // Ling Ling and the friends are worried about the discouraged Gina. Gina just announced that she will stop doing somersaults anymore because she accidentally hurt her friends while practicing.

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ling Ling tells Rainbow Ruby that Rainbow Village friends were playing around the Rainbow fountain to cool off from the heat but water suddenly stopped coming out of the fountain. Rainbow Ruby uses her magic suitcase to become a plumber and starts fixing the fountain. // Kiki's face has turned purple because she ate magical Plumen berries. Kiki accidentally picked magical Plumen berries instead of the delicious rainbow berries she was trying to gather.

programme.title: Franklin and Friends
programme.desc: "Franklin and Friends," based on the children's book series featuring Franklin, is a computer-animated series geared toward preschoolers that aims to teach the kids lessons. The series follows Franklin the turtle, now older than in the books and previous TV series, as he experiences adventures and achieves milestones in the community of Woodland, learning lessons along the way. Franklin's friends referenced in the title include best friend Bear, problem-solving Snail, practical joker Rabbit, natural leader Beaver, inventive Fox and empathetic Goose. The series tackles issues that include personal empowerment, socialization, self-esteem, appreciation of nature and school issues.

programme.desc: As Rev and Avery compete to see who can be the best helper, they accidentally work against each other and end up making things more complicated for those they // Rev thinks Avery is moving away! Finally, Avery confronts their strange behaviour.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev is sure he has the perfect plan to catch an elusive frog, but Avery isn't so sure. After all of his attempts fall through, he's finally ready to accept help-and Avery's idea just might work! Will they finally catch the Green Phantom? // Rev and Avery compete to transport supplies to town for a big event. Avery is faster, so Rev tries to take a short cut to get ahead-but an obstacle stops him in his tracks. How will he finish his delivery in time, let alone win the competition?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Avery go on an adventure to discover the Crystal Cavern. As they enter the first cave, a swarm of bats scare Rumble so much, he takes off through a maze of tunnels! They can't worry about the Crystal Cavern-they have to find Rumble first! // When Molly tells a campfire story about the Fender Bend Beast, the kids' imaginations run wild. Covered in goop and debris, Rumble scares them into thinking he's the Beast! Avery hatches a plan to trap the "Beast" and save Rumble, who's gone missing

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: After a snowstorm, Rev and Avery compete for title of Champion of the Winter Bestival! Avery is determined to hold her title from last year. Rev's Dad suggests a "slow and steady" approach to win, but Rev can't resist using "Rumble power!" // When Rumble wakes Rev in the middle of the night, they hear a strange sound, and see lights in the forest. The next day, Ben encourages them to investigate further. Rev and his friends follow the trail of missing trees to discover the truth!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When damage from a storm threatens to cancel the Wild Wheelin' Stunt Park Skills Contest, Owen is disappointed he won't get to compete. Rev leads the kids in the Stunt Park clean-up, and soon discovers that this is really an opportunity in disguise! // Rev and the gang make their own castle and play as knights of old. But when their sticks and building supplies begin to disappear, Bo leads them into a medieval battle of wits with the culprit-a cranky beaver!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rumble cracks his mirror, he thinks it gave him bad luck, and his confidence takes a hit. Even after Rev fixes the mirror and bolsters his pal, the bad luck continues. But when danger strikes, can Rumble regain his self-esteem and save the day? // When Rev hears about a vehicle long jump contest, he dreams of fame and victory. But even with a grueling training plan from coaches Avery and Alley, the record-breaking jump seems out of reach...until Alley ends up in danger and needs their help!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev offers to help look after a rambunctious puppy, Rumble gets jealous of all the attention he gets. And much to his annoyance, while Rev and Avery try everything to teach the pup new tricks (with no success), it only has eyes for Rumble! // When Rev tries to teach Rumble to swim with his special inflated tires, Rumble keeps sinking to the bottom of the pond. Ben and Molly suggest they get advice from Gilly, the old Fender Bend ferry pilot.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When a game of Bumper Ball gets a little too heated, the friends start competing against their own teammates! But when a stray ball knocks open the sheep pen, they'll have to learn to work together to round up the sheep...and get back to the game! // Rev and his friends receive a map in pieces, so they race up separate mountain trails, vying to be first to claim the treasure at the top. But when there's no treasure in sight at the end, Rev's parents have some advice for finding the real reward.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Avery set out to conquer a legendary endurance course, the course's challenges put their truck power to the test. But as they near the end, a call for help takes them off course-and straight into a rescue mission to save their heroes! // When Rev sees Lori working the quarry in secret, Lori asks Rev to keep it secret-she worries she isn't good enough, and dreams of working with the big quarry trucks one day. But when quarry workers need help, Rev has to convince Lori to save the day!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev can't wait to take Avery camping. But when he learns they're trying a new campsite for the first time ever, he is disappointed-what if the new campsite isn't as fun...or worse...boring?! It's up to Avery to get him excited for a new adventure! // Rev wants to be just like his dad, so he and Rumble attempt Ben and Duke's usual tasks. They're disappointed when they aren't strong enough to tackle the big jobs the way Ben would, but sometimes, a little Rev magic and Rumble power are even better!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev and Avery find a stray kitten, they put posters around to alert its owner. The owner arrives at the Gear Up Garage...just as the kitty vanishes! Rev and the gang set out to find the kitten, and Operation Kitten Care becomes Operation Rescue! // When Rev leads the gang in a fossil hunting expedition, they find an enormous skull! But when Molly breaks the news that they'll have to leave the skeleton for professionals to dig up, Rev wonders how he can still have a dinosaur of his own.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: It's Mudder's Day-everyone's favourite day of the year! The Stunt Park is filled with mud, and the whole town gets to drive through it. But Rev can't join them until he gets a gift for his Mom...and the stores are all closed for the festivities! // After Bo shows off his action-hero moves, Rev wants him to star in his film. Bu Bo freezes with stage fright as soon as Rev turns the camera on! Bo wants to be brave and come through for his friends, but how can he overcome his fear?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Rumble teach Bentley the puppy to play Hide and Seek! At first the pup doesn't get it...but soon Bentley's hiding so well, they can't find him! Can Rumble use Bentley's instincts to help them track down their puppy pal? // A big winter storm is headed for town...and it's Christmas Eve! What if Santa can't find them through the snow? Rev and the kids round up their own toys and deliver them to all the kids in town-just in case! But can they make it through the storm?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Stuckey the garbage truck dreams of entering the Auto Show, so Rev and the gang clean him up for his big debut. But after saving his friends from danger, Stuckey winds up covered in mud all over again...just in time for his moment in the spotlight! // When Lori only receives two tickets to a movie premiere, her friends compete to see which one of them is her "best friend." But watching her friends compete only makes Lori feel terrible-she'd rather not go to the movie at all!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: As the Gear Up Grand Prix begins, each of the friends runs into problems and must drop out of the race. Soon, slow and steady Lori is the only one left standing! Cheered on by her friends, can Lori and Tipper find the confidence to win? // When the gang puts on a Chinese New Year play, they cast Rumble as the monster. He's a natural! But in rehearsal Rumble begins to worry that he'll be too scary for the audience on opening night. Rumble will need his friends to help him find his roar!

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: A teacher by day and comic by night, Cory Michaelis keeps his act edgy enough to keep the audience from feeling like they're in his 10th grade History class. He cleverly tells short stories and jokes that try to get audiences to think but are silly and absurd as well. Cory is a regular in all of the clubs in the Pacific Northwest and has headlined clubs, colleges, casinos, and weird bars all over the country. He didn't win the 2013 World Series of Comedy (semi-finals), the 2012 Seattle International Comedy Competition (SICC), or the 2014 Tacoma Comedy Contest (2nd) but he took another crack at the SICC and made the 2014 finals.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy

programme.title: Jamie Lissow
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Jamie Lissow is best known for his role in the current Netflix Original Series Real Rob, alongside SNL alum Rob Schneider, a show Jamie co-wrote and co-produced. Jamie made his network television debut on The Tonight Show and has since appeared on The Late Late Show, Last Comic Standing, Comedy Central's Premium Blend, Gotham Live, Star Search, and his own half-hour Comedy Central special. A headliner at comedy clubs across the country, he's also been featured at The Montreal Comedy Festival and The Great American Comedy Festival. Lissow has appeared on Fox News Redeye more than 50 times while still managing to have no political opinions.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Leanne Morgan exudes southern charm. She is a naturally funny storyteller who gives an honest look at suburban life and the challenges of keeping her husband happy while juggling kids, dogs and cheerleading camp at the same time she's racing to get her hair highlighted, have a colonoscopy and join weight watchers for the 7th time! Leanne will take you on a hilarious journey through motherhood and beyond as she finds comedy amidst the chaos.

programme.title: Collin Moulton
programme.desc: Collin is one of the most fun, personable, and sought after headliners today. He has had his own stand-up special on SHOWTIME, he's been on NICKELODEON, and was recently featured on LAST CALL WITH CARSON DALY. Touring for over 15 years Collin has gained an ease and enjoyment on stage that makes every show worth watching.America knows and loves him. His familiarity and energy engages and relieves the audience before he even speaks. His electric storytelling style makes you care about every topic he explores. Collin's comedy is the release needed from our every day lives. Come needing to laugh tonight, leave wanting to laugh forever!Collin Moulton

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks

programme.title: Love Again
programme.desc: A distant father (Kevin Sorbo) and a lost girlfriend to his best friend (Ben Davies) leads Nathan (Jason Burkey) on a journey of rediscovery.

programme.title: Maternal Instinct
programme.desc: A teenage girl who sees her mother shot goes into hiding with a police detective who grows attached to her as she protects her from the killer who is hunting the girl.

programme.title: Ivy & Mistletoe
programme.desc: A young woman is determined to get home for Christmas, but gets stranded in a small town during a snow storm. Little does she know that she is exactly where she is supposed to be.

programme.title: Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: The beloved "Painter of Light," Thomas Kinkade, presents this heartwarming family drama. Due to an unforeseen road closure, eight strangers are forced to take refuge in an abandoned church during a snow storm.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: Tintin and his friends discover directions to a sunken ship commanded by Capt. Haddock's ancestor and go off on a treasure hunt.

programme.title: ParaNorman
programme.desc: Norman Babcock finds his paranormal abilities pushed to their limits to take on zombies and ghosts, and save his town from a centuries-old curse.

programme.title: Earth to Echo
programme.desc: After receiving a bizarre series of encrypted messages, a group of kids embark on an adventure with an alien who needs their help.

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: On a rescue mission, the USS Enterprise is attacked by Krall, a warlord sworn against the Federation. Crashed on an uncharted world, the crew must join forces with Jaylah, a rebellious alien warrior, to escape and stop Krall from triggering all-out war.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: Audrey Hepburn's portrayal of a modern-day princess, rebelling against the royal obligations, who explores Rome on her own. This romantic comedy ranks as one of the most enjoyable films of all times.

programme.title: The African Queen
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: Greatest Show On Earth
programme.desc: Charlton Heston stars as Brad Braden, the circus manager who lives and breathes to keep the show rolling. With the Big Top about to hit rock bottom, Braden hires The Great Sebastian, a daring trapeze legend, to revitalize the circus.

programme.title: Hard Cash
programme.desc: This fast-paced crime thriller stars Christian Slater and Val Kilmer. Released from prison, an infamous thief and his new crew pull off a brilliant robbery and become embroiled with a corrupt FBI agent when they discover the money is marked.

programme.title: Steel Frontier
programme.desc: A story of a gunfighter who goes after a band of marauders that is terrorizing and killing indiscriminately.

programme.title: Danger Zone
programme.desc: An American mining engineer (Billy Zane, "Titanic") gets involved in a civil war and international conspiracy in Africa. Featuring Robert Downey Jr.

programme.title: Airplane vs. Volcano
programme.desc: When an airplane is trapped in a ring of erupting volcanoes, the passengers must survive without landing.

programme.title: The Code
programme.desc: A veteran thief recruits a younger crook to help him pull off one final job in order to repay his debt to the Russian mob.

programme.title: Britney Spears: Unbreakable
programme.desc: Look into the glamorous and tumultuous life of pop sensation Britney Spears. From her incredible skyrocketing ascent into stardom to her personal troubles and downfalls, see the inside of the star's life with exclusive interviews. This is the story of Britney Spears- Unbreakable.

programme.title: Taylor Swift: Superstar
programme.desc: Taylor Swift completed her transition from country star to pop superstar. With exclusive interviews and footage, discover the remarkable story of the most powerful woman in Pop.

programme.title: Adele: Homecoming
programme.desc: "Adele is a Grammy Award-winning artist whose soulful sound has thrust her into the limelight. Her soulful voice, frank personality and chart-topping hits have made her one of the most successful artists of all time. Her authenticity in her work appeals to so many there are no gimmicks with Adele. What you see is what you get. Through her own words, video and live performances, this documentary takes an incredible look at the life and times of one of the greatest artists of all time."

programme.title: Justin Bieber: The New Me
programme.desc: From teenage heartthrob to married man, Justin Bieber's career has had its ups and downs, but the young superstar has continued to evolve his identity.

programme.title: Hollywood Signs
programme.desc: Hollywood Signs is the documentary that celebrates autograph collecting, collectors, and our obsession with celebrities. It focuses on autograph dealing, the history of the autograph, autograph conventions, celebrities' point of view, and, of course, the folks whose lives revolve around autographs. Hollywood Signs is a love letter to a world with characters you definitely don't see every day.

programme.title: Ecstasy Of Order: The Tetris Master
programme.desc: Follows a group of record-holding Tetris players as they prepare to compete in the 2010 Classic Tetris World Championship.

programme.title: Black Girl Magic
programme.desc: Fall under the spell of these five hilariously talented black women from all walks of life, and all parts of the U.S., in this side splitting stand-up special. Starring NY's Brooklyn Jones, LA's Alycia Cooper, Chicago's Just Nesh, Milwaukee's Kelly Kellz and hosted by Atlanta's Ashima Franklin. Filmed on location live from Punta Cana, Dominican Republic.

programme.title: Heart and Soul Food
programme.desc: Three sisters fight for their mom's approval, unaware that their mother is dealing with a struggle of her own.

programme.title: Covered Silence
programme.desc: Looking for help from a lifetime of trauma, Lala checks in at a mental hospital. There, she meets Niani, and the two form an unbreakable bond of friendship. Once released, Niani learns she is pregnant, and is fearful that her mental illness, and medications will affect the baby. Lala takes it upon herself to protect Niani at all costs. All that changes when Lala's own mental health is jeopardized, when her estranged mother returns in her life.

programme.title: Cries of Desire
programme.desc: Jermaine an aspiring male model controls his wife Ariel until a terrible accident invites a dangerous affair.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Coming home for the holidays is something most families cherish. After this holiday, Christmas will never be the same in the Higher-Mills family. Coming from mixed backgrounds, adopted siblings Smythe, Hanna, Bea, Shane, and Lonny along with their parents, Pat and Samantha, try to navigate their changing family and reunite during the holiday season.

programme.title: My Dad's Christmas Date
programme.desc: It's Christmas in York. Jules, 16, knows all she and her dad really need for Christmas is love. Jules attempts to set up her dad online with a girlfriend - what could go wrong? Plenty...

programme.title: Holiday Breakup
programme.desc: Holiday Breakup VOD

programme.title: Santa Girl
programme.desc: Santa Claus' only daughter wants to experience the "real world" before she must marry the son of Jack Frost, a boy she has never met, and take over the family business. Along with her trusty elf, Cassie Claus sets off to college while trying to keep her magic powers and famous father a secret. At school Cassie is pursued by two boys: Sam, sweetly awkward and J.R., handsome and wealthy. As her impending arranged marriage looms, Cassie struggles with her feelings for Sam and her obligation to her father and Christmas.

programme.title: Falling for Christmas
programme.desc: When champion figure skater Claire becomes injured she is sent to a rehabilitation center in the snowy mountains where she meets and falls for a local ice fisherman who shows her there is more to life than competition.

programme.title: Our Wife
programme.desc: A self-pitying, drunken composer finds inspiration in a new woman only to have his ex-wife decide that she now wants him back.

programme.title: The Magic Carpet
programme.desc: Arabian Nights-type of tale stars Agar as a deposed prince trying to free his people from the evil rule of the caliph, the princess Narah (Lucille Ball) and his vizier, played by Burr. Agar enlists the aid of harem girl Patricia Medina and together they win back the province, while zipping around on a flying carpet.

programme.title: You Were Never Lovelier
programme.desc: Love story and musical set in Latin America.

programme.title: Duffy
programme.desc: Duffy is a cunning aristocrat of criminals who is hired by Stefane, a young playboy, to hijack a boat carrying several million dollars of his father's fortune. The plot succeeds, with a little help from Segolene, Stefane's girlfriend - but also with an unexpected, sudden turn of events.

programme.title: Convicted
programme.desc: Fact-based story about a Tennessee letter carrier who was falsely convicted of a rape however, his legal problems continue even after the real rapist confesses.

programme.title: Passions
programme.desc: A man with a wife and daughter also has a son with another woman. When he dies this little secret is revealed to the wife.

programme.title: Modern Romance
programme.desc: A story of modern careers, modern sporting goods, modern filmmaking... and an ancient war--the battle of the sexes. Edited for TV

programme.title: The Man Who Loved Women
programme.desc: A charming and romantic comedy about a man who never met a woman he couldn't love. Edited for TV

programme.desc: Hayden plays a ranch foreman who has $12,000 stolen from him. To get the money back, Hayden and his pals disguise themselves as women and nab the crooks. Bob Wills and His Texas Playboys provide the music.

programme.title: The Untamed Breed
programme.desc: A Texas wrangler's effort to help a group of struggling ranchers is undone by a jealous rival's play for a beautiful woman.

programme.title: Gunmen From Laredo
programme.desc: A jailed rancher escapes to track down the outlaws who framed him for a murder he didn't commit.

programme.title: The Rough, Tough West
programme.desc: Steve Reynolds aka The Durango Kid, helps out a group of miners who are being forced to pay the greedy Mahoney to travel across his land, which he has acquired illegally. Reynolds enlists the aid of his alter ego, "The Durango Kid," and ends Mahoney's evil reign.

programme.title: Apache Territory

programme.title: Eric Clapton & Steve Winwood
programme.desc: History rocked and rock made history during a sold-out three-gig stand at Madison Square Garden in late February 2008 when icons Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood performed a concert together for the first time since their all-too-brief days in the legendary Blind Faith in 1969. Whether they will ever team again is unknown. But with Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood Live From Madison Square Garden fans everywhere are able to experience the sound and the glory of a performance on that famous stage by two of rock's greatest artists.

programme.title: Marimar Capítulo 29

programme.title: Marimar Capítulo 30
programme.desc: Bella toma la decisión de ir a trabajar al club de Valle Encantado para solucionar los negocios de Gustavo. Bella se presenta ante Bernardo para conocer los detalles del club.

programme.title: Soy Tu Dueña Capítulo 95
programme.desc: Valentina está desesperada porque descubre que el reloj de su papá fue robado. José Miguel le reclama a Leonor el préstamo que le pidió a Valentina. Valentina da la orden de despedir a Rosendo de los cascabeles.

programme.title: Soy Tu Dueña Capítulo 96
programme.desc: Rosendo le pide a Valentina una nueva oportunidad para trabajar en los Cascabeles, pero ella lo rechaza. Alonso está decidido a reconquistar a Valentina. Sabino le dice a Leonor que le contará la verdad a José Miguel sobre los delitos de ella y Rosendo.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 61
programme.desc: María le dice a Juan Pablo que en Bernarda ha encontrado a la madre que perdió. Victoria logra ver a Linda con Osvaldo y se va decepcionada, se toma varias pastillas, Osvaldo y Fer la encuentran y termina en el hospital al borde del coma.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 62
programme.desc: María le dice a Juan Pablo que no puede odiar a Victoria. Victoria le reclama a Osvaldo por traicionar su amor. María sospecha que Victoria hizo que la despidieran. María le pide a Max que impida que su madre se desquite con ella, ya que juró destruirla.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 63
programme.desc: Bernarda confirma que María es la hija de Juan Pablo. Victoria le dice a Osvaldo que está dispuesta a luchar por su matrimonio. Guillermo estrangula a Ofelia cuando ésta intenta chantajearlo. María le dice a Max que tiene una sorpresa para él.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 64
programme.desc: Victoria le promete a Osvaldo contarle sus secretos cuando él le confiese los suyos. Victoria le cuenta a Max la historia de su hija. Bernarda amenaza al padre Jerónimo por sugerirle que busque ayuda médica. Max le promete a Victoria encontrar a su hija.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 38
programme.desc: Marichuy y Juan Miguel tienen un inesperado encuentro en el hospital cuando ambos van a visitar a Rocio antes de que sea operada. Marichuy siente mareos fuera de lo común. Viviana regresa a España.

programme.title: La Que No Podía Amar Capítulo 40
programme.desc: Fermín le agradece a Gustavo por lograr que no se construya un hotel en sus tierras. Ana Paula lleva a cabo sus planes para irse de la hacienda. Rosaura le confiesa a Federico que Ana Paula es su hija.

programme.title: Lazos de Amor Capítulo 96

programme.title: Lazos de Amor Capítulo 97

programme.title: Lazos de Amor Capítulo 98

programme.title: Mañana Es Para Siempre Capítulo 37

programme.title: Vecinos

programme.desc: Miguel le encuentra a Mía un corazón con su nombre, pero ella le dice que es una broma. Mientras finge ahogarse para llamar la atención de Mauro, Roberta sufre un accidente real. Diego se mete en un altercado y es golpeado y herido con un cuchillo.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Roberta y Mía compiten por Mauro, pero éste dirige su atención a Alma, que viene a visitar a su hija. Diego afirma que sus heridas se deben a una pelea con Miguel. Pilar imprime unas notas que revelan secretos, provocando disputas en el grupo.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Miguel amenaza a Mía por humillar a Celina. Mía se disculpa con Celina. Diego intenta vengarse de la persona que lo agredió, pero su padre interviene entregando al matón a la policía. Roberta, movida por los celos, insulta a Alma.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Franco se reconcilia con Mía. Casualmente Franco y Miguel se conocen. Tratando de ocultar que Diego está borracho, Mía lo besa. Aparece un nuevo anónimo y Diego cree que Roberta es la autora. Roberta besa a Mauro y Pascual los descubre.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Miguel le pide a Celina que sea su novia para conseguir información sobre el padre de Mía. Diego empuja a Roberta al lago, en venganza Roberta le tira la guitarra y él la amenaza con matarla. Otra carta anónima aparece, ante el temor de Roberta.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Mía le pide a Franco una foto de su madre. Diego amenaza a Roberta, pero León los interrumpe. Miguel se acerca a Franco con el pretexto de pedirle una entrevista para una tarea. Nico se golpea la cabeza peleando con Miguel tras insultarlo.

programme.title: Rebelde
programme.desc: Roberta convence a Lupita de no cambiar de dormitorio. Pascual encuentra la cartera de Diego entre las cosas de Roberta y la acusa de ser una ladrona. Nico miente para salvar a Miguel. León amenaza con enviar a Diego a la escuela militar.

programme.title: Fuego en la Sangre Capítulo 61

programme.title: Fuego en la Sangre Capítulo 62
programme.desc: Don Agustín les aconseja a Jimena y Sarita que huyan para no casarse con hombres que no aman. Sofía le dice a Juan que tiene miedo de perder su amor porque no puede acercarse a él.

programme.title: Fuego en la Sangre Capítulo 63

programme.title: Fuego en la Sangre Capítulo 64

programme.title: Corazón Salvaje Capítulo 128

programme.title: Natacha

programme.title: La inocente
programme.desc: La inocencia de una mujer por un déficit, se convertirá en la peor pesadilla para sus seres queridos, después de que la cruda realidad del mundo exterior no la respetó y la convirtió en su víctima.

programme.title: Mamá, soy Paquito
programme.desc: Paquito vive con su madre en la pobreza y por ello canta para ganar dinero y poder darle una buena vida. La madre de Paquito muere y ahora él busca el amor de su padre, el cual es un hombre muy rico y a la vez despreciable.

programme.title: El día de las madres
programme.desc: Tres madres sufren al ver a sus hijos crecer, enfrentarse a los retos de la vida, enamorarse, cumplir sus sueños y luchar por salir adelante. A pesar de las adversidades, los muchachos celebran el 10 de mayo con la mujer más importante de sus vidas.

programme.title: Enamorada

programme.title: María Candelaria
programme.desc: María Candelaria y Lorenzo Rafael quieren casarse pero no tienen dinero. María Candelaria enferma y Lorenzo Rafael roba medicina para curarla. Él va a la cárcel y ella muere apedreada por los lugareños, quienes piensan que posó desnuda para un pintor.

programme.title: Salón México

programme.title: Doña Bárbara
programme.desc: Doña Bárbara es una terrateniente que utiliza a los hombres para conseguir todas sus tierras y riquezas, tiene una hija, Marisela, que se convierte en su rival de amor, pues las dos están enamoradas del mismo hombre.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho

programme.desc: Una joven es criticada y discriminada por su forma de vestir y comportarse, al grado de que sus compañeros inventan un rumor sobre su sexualidad. La situación comienza a salirse de control y la joven corre el riesgo de ser expulsada.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
programme.sub-title: 'A quien cuece y amasa, no le quites la hogaza'
programme.desc: Una joven sueña con su fiesta de quince años, pero debido a que su papá decide vender la casa donde vive, su madre tiene que tomar el dinero de la fiesta. La joven se obsesiona con su fiesta y comienza a tratar mal a todos a su alrededor.

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho

programme.title: Como Dice el Dicho
